name: poi-sharing-backend
description: Backend API for POI sharing mobile application

scripts.db:setup: cat src/scripts/ddl.sql | docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U postgres -d poi_sharing_app
scripts.db:seed: cat src/scripts/seed.sql | docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U postgres -d poi_sharing_app
scripts.db:init: npm run db:setup && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d postgres && npm run db:init

author: Your Name
